Trade/Device Name(s): Chemtrue Single/Multi-Panel Drug Screen Cassette and Dip Card Tests
Chemtrue Single/Multi-Panel Drug Screen Dip Card
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Chemtrue Single/Multi-Panel Drug Screen Cassette and Dip Card Tests for rapid qualitative detection of six drugs of abuse in urine via lateral flow immunoassay.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of up to six drugs of abuse in human urine for health care professional, in vitro diagnostic and Over-the-Counter (OTC) use, providing preliminary results that require confirmation by alternative chemical methods such as GC/MS or LC/MS.
